00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Snort extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'snort';
00041     public $User= '_snort';
00042     
00043     public $NVPS= '\h';
00044     public $ConfFile= '/etc/snort/snort.conf';
00045     public $LogFile= '/var/log/snort/snort.log';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/bin/snort -V 2>&1';
00048 
00049     private $re_RulePrefix= 'include\h*\$(RULE_PATH|PREPROC_RULE_PATH)\/';
00050 
00051     function Snort()
00052     {
00053         parent::Model();
00054         
00055         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00056             $this->Commands,
00057             array(
00058                 'Start'=>   array(
00059                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00060                     'desc'  =>  _('Start snort'),
00061                     ),
00062 
00063                 'StopProcess'=> array(
00064                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00065                     'desc'  => _('Stop Snort instance'),
00066                     ),
00067 
00068                 'GetRules'      =>  array(
00069                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00070                     'desc'  =>  _('Get rules'),
00071                     ),
00072                 
00073                 'GetDisabledRules'=>    array(
00074                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00075                     'desc'  =>  _('Get disabled rules'),
00076                     ),
00077 
00078                 'DisableRule'   =>  array(
00079                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00080                     'desc'  =>  _('Disable rule'),
00081                     ),
00082 
00083                 'EnableRule'    =>  array(
00084                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00085                     'desc'  =>  _('Enable rule'),
00086                     ),
00087 
00088                 'MoveRuleUp'=>  array(
00089                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00090                     'desc'  =>  _('Move rule up'),
00091                     ),
00092 
00093                 'MoveRuleDown'=>    array(
00094                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00095                     'desc'  =>  _('Move rule down'),
00096                     ),
00097 
00098                 'SetStartupIfs' =>  array(
00099                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME, NAME),
00100                     'desc'  =>  _('Set startup ifs'),
00101                     ),
00102                 )
00103             );
00104     }
00105 
00106     function GetVersion()
00107     {
00108         return $this->RunShellCommand($this->VersionCmd.' | /usr/bin/head -3 | /usr/bin/tail -2');
00109     }
00110 
00111     function Start($if)
00112     {
00113         global $TmpFile;
00114 
00115         $cmd= "/usr/local/bin/snort -i $if -D -d -c $this->ConfFile -u _snort -g _snort -b -l /var/snort/log";
00116         $count= 0;
00117         while ($count++ < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00118             if ($this->IsInstanceRunning($if)) {
00119                 return TRUE;
00120             }
00121             $this->RunShellCommand("$cmd > $TmpFile 2>&1");
00123             exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00124         }
00125 
00127         $output= file_get_contents($TmpFile);
00128         ViewError($output);
00129         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Start failed with: $output");
00130 
00131         // Check one last time due to the last sleep in the loop
00132         return $this->IsInstanceRunning($if);
00133     }
00134 
00135     function Stop()
00136     {
00137         global $TmpFile;
00138 
00139         $cmd= '/usr/bin/pkill -U_snort';
00140 
00141         $count= 0;
00142         while ($count++ < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00143             if (!$this->IsInstanceRunning('\w+')) {
00144                 return TRUE;
00145             }
00146             $this->RunShellCommand("$cmd > $TmpFile 2>&1");
00148             exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00149         }
00150 
00152         $output= file_get_contents($TmpFile);
00153         ViewError($output);
00154         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Kill failed with: $output");
00155 
00156         // Check one last time due to the last sleep in the loop
00157         return !$this->IsInstanceRunning('\w+');
00158     }
00159 
00164     function StopProcess($if)
00165     {
00166         $pid= $this->FindPid($if);
00167         if ($pid > -1) {
00168             return $this->KillPid($pid);
00169         }
00170         return TRUE;
00171     }
00172 
00178     function FindPid($if)
00179     {
00180         $pidcmd= "/bin/ps arwwx | /usr/bin/grep snort | /usr/bin/grep '$if' | /usr/bin/grep -v -e cwc.php -e grep";
00181         exec($pidcmd, $output, $retval);
00182 
00183         foreach ($output as $psline) {
00184             $re= '/\h+-i\h+(\w+)\b/';
00185             if (preg_match($re, $psline)) {
00186                 $re= '/^\s*(\d+)\s+/';
00187                 if (preg_match($re, $psline, $match)) {
00188                     if ($match[1] !== '') {
00189                         return $match[1];
00190                     }
00191                 }
00192             }
00193         }
00194         return -1;
00195     }
00196 
00204     function IsInstanceRunning($if)
00205     {
00206         $re= "\/usr\/local\/bin\/snort\s+[^\n]*-i\s+$if\s+[^\n]*";
00207 
00208         $output= $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/ps arwwx -U_snort');
00209         if (preg_match("/$re/m", $output)) {
00210             return TRUE;
00211         }
00212         return FALSE;
00213     }
00214 
00215     function SetConfig($confname)
00216     {
00217         global $basicConfig, $advancedConfig;
00218 
00219         $this->Config= ${$confname};
00220     }
00221 
00225     function GetRules()
00226     {
00227         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*$this->re_RulePrefix([^#\s]+)\h*$/m", 2);
00228     }
00229 
00233     function GetDisabledRules()
00234     {
00235         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*$this->COMC\h*$this->re_RulePrefix([^#\s]+)\b\h*$/m", 2);
00236     }
00237 
00238     function EnableRule($rule)
00239     {
00240         return $this->EnableName($this->ConfFile, "$this->re_RulePrefix$rule");
00241     }
00242 
00243     function DisableRule($rule)
00244     {
00245         return $this->DisableName($this->ConfFile, "$this->re_RulePrefix$rule");
00246     }
00247 
00248     function MoveRuleUp($rule)
00249     {
00250         $rule= Escape($rule, '/.');
00251         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*(($this->re_RulePrefix[^\n]+)\n+($this->COMC\h*$this->re_RulePrefix[^\n]+\n+)*)\h*($this->re_RulePrefix$rule)\n/m", '${6}'."\n".'${1}');
00252     }
00253 
00254     function MoveRuleDown($rule)
00255     {
00256         $rule= Escape($rule, '/.');
00257         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*($this->re_RulePrefix$rule)\n+\h*(($this->COMC\h*$this->re_RulePrefix[^\n]+\n+)*($this->re_RulePrefix[^\n]+)\n+)/m", '${3}'.'${1}'."\n");
00258     }
00259 
00260     function SetStartupIfs($lanif, $wanif)
00261     {
00262         $re= '|(\h*/usr/local/bin/snort\h+.*-i\h+)(\w+\d+)(\h+.*\h+/usr/local/bin/snort\h+.*-i\h+)(\w+\d+)(\h+.*)|ms';
00263         return $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/rc.local', $re, '${1}'.$lanif.'${3}'.$wanif.'${5}');
00264     }
00265 }
